txt.en:
'There is little else that I can help you with, [placeholder]. It's a pity that tool was stolen... I would have dearly loved to see it.

'Ah well, perhaps you should return to the Elf who sent you... Eglamír was it? He may have more words of wisdom for you.

'Celondim is far off, I understand... in the shadows of the Blue Mountains. You will want to start off soon.'
'This is ill news, [placeholder]. With that tool, Angmar may do great harm in Eriador....'
'I believe you mentioned you came here from Celondim...?'
Newbold Leafcutter directed you to the tomb of Maenadar the Craftsman, but you came too late to recover Celebrimbor's shaping tool.
Eglamír is at Celondim in Ered Luin, far to the west of Bree-land.\n\nNewbold Leafcutter suggested you return to Eglamír for more advice.
